decks.name: Hog Cycle 2.6
decks.tips: Use cheap cycle cards to apply constant pressure and defend efficiently. Save Musketeer and Cannon for air and tank threats.

decks.name: Log Bait
decks.tips: Force out your opponent's small spells with bait troops, then punish with Goblin Barrel when their log is out of cycle.

decks.name: PEKKA Bridge Spam
decks.tips: Apply dual‑lane pressure with Bandit and Battle Ram. Use P.E.K.K.A for heavy tank defence and counter‑push once your opponent overcommits.

decks.name: Royal Giant Lightning
decks.tips: Control tempo with Royal Giant at the bridge. Use Fisherman to pull tanks off your tower, and punish pumps or buildings with Lightning.
